name: Introductory Pack (Free P&P, limited to 1 per customer)
description: One manual and a promotional DVD which includes the first half of the session one of the teaching.

name: Manual
description:
Introductory offer: reduced from £5.00 to £3.99

150 pages packed with notes, quotes and visuals to accompany the DVD teaching. The manual also contains questions for small group discussion, daily reading plans that build up to the next session, a glossary and recommended reading. Each participant would benefit from their own manual.

To run The Bible Course you will need at least 1 DVD set per course and a manual for each person on the course.

Once you've purchased The Bible Course materials, register your course by filling in the contact form on the website to receive a free copy of the DVD: How to Run The Bible Course (Leaders Guide).

*If you're ordering over 40 items a discount of 10% could be applicable to your order: please email us at office@thebiblecourse.org to apply for this discount.*

name: DVD Set
description:
Introductory offer: reduced from £25.00 to £19.99

A DVD box set containing the full 8 session teaching with each session on a separate DVD.

To run The Bible Course you will need at least 1 DVD set per course and a manual for each person on the course.

Once you've purchased The Bible Course materials, register your course by filling in the contact form on the website to receive a free copy of the DVD: How to Run The Bible Course (Leaders Guide).

*If you're ordering over 40 items a discount of 10% could be applicable to your order: please email us at office@thebiblecourse.org to apply for this discount.*
